column5: Pretty slick operation Best crankbaits and stick baits out there IMO. Getting a bit expensive. Bought  a wack from Lebaron's before they checked out.
Set to see  I'm amazed at how a mass produced lure company essentially makes baits that run flawless.  I've had one rapala in my life that didn't run true

Been there for a tour. It's in the middle of the woods. The tour was nice but the goodie bag was nicer as it had 10 lures and a T shirt in it. I loved the smell of Balsa wood being turned. They have a facility in Ireland, look on the box, most likely says Made in Ireland.
